text:
Since JMeter 1.7.3 (and in 1.8), JDBC request "results" are shown in a result 
view as following
org.apache.jmeter.protocol.jdbc.sampler.JDBCSampler@345e9a

while in 1.7beta3 (from March 2002), the view results tree would show a nicely 
formatted table (columns + rows) from the results of SQL SELECT in the same 
area.

Please restore the lost behaviour, allowing again to assess the correctness of 
query results.

Regards,
 Jörg Höhle.
creator: Joerg-Cyril.Hoehle@t-systems.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Oops. Sorry, I mistakenly assigned this bug instead of the previous one in the
list. Bugzilla is confusing, sometimes...

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Confirmed the bug is still there. It's a regression. Assigning it to me.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-editing to close all bugs reported fixed by 1.8.1.
